attributes.action: Allow supervised COVID secure youth team sports to continue beyond 5th November
attributes.additional_details: We would ask that they also allow structured and supervised youth teams sports to continue as well
attributes.background: Sport is important for the physical and mental health of young people and since the summer it has been shown that team sports can be organised in a Covid secure way. The government is keeping schools open during the proposed COVID lockdown from 5 November to 2 December 2020.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557785
